be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.models.handlers

Class CollaborationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.models.handlers.CollaborationHandler

  • class CollaborationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Sub Facade that handles the collaborations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollaborationHandler(User currentUser)
      Initialises the collaboration facade with the given user.

      • deleteRowWithRefusedInvitation

        void deleteRowWithRefusedInvitation(Project project,
                                    User collaborator)
                             throws DatabaseException,
                                    ConnectionFailedException
        Deletes the row with a refused invitation.
        Parameters:
        project - project to delete.
        collaborator - the collaborator to the project that has refused the invitation.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - If the resultSet does not contain one user or if there is an error during the access to the database.
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails

      • updateInvitationRead

        void updateInvitationRead(Project project,
                          User collaborator)
                   throws DatabaseException,
                          ConnectionFailedException
        Updates the InvitationRead column in the database to 1. It means that the sender of invitation has read the window with all the invitations that he sent to his collaboration.
        Parameters:
        project - the project which is the ProjectID column.
        collaborator - the collaborator which is the UserId column
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - If the resultSet does not contain one user or if there is an error during the access to the database.
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails

        Parameters:
        newProject - the new project to add

      • removeCollaborationFromProject

        void removeCollaborationFromProject(Project project)
                             throws DatabaseException,
                                    ConnectionFailedException
        Removes the collaboration of the connected user from the selected project.
        Parameters:
        project - the project
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - if a problem occurs while deleting the project in projectDatabase
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails
